author: assaf
msg: Under RubyGems 1.3.0, the list of local repositories include ~/.gem.  Since this directory is writeable, set_get_home picks it up, and so rake setup/install use it instead of sudo and the default repository.  Removing set_get_home makes rake setup/install use the generic repository and sudo, allowing it to create files in /usr/bin.
